name: RICHARDS ENSIGN SURGICAL SUPPLY CORPORATION, Appellant v. RICHARDS MANUFACTURING COMPANY, INC., William M. Rorer, Inc., and Rorer Group, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Richards Ensign Surgical Supply Corp. v. Richards Manufacturing Co.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
FLAHERTY, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: RICHARDS ENSIGN SURGICAL SUPPLY CORPORATION, Appellant v. RICHARDS MANUFACTURING COMPANY, INC., William M. Rorer, Inc., and Rorer Group, Inc.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AFFIRMED.
FLAHERTY, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Chester S. Fossee, Reale, Fossee & Ferry P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Howard D. Schwartz, Eckert, Seamans, Cherin & Mellott, Pittsburgh, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
497 A.2d 611
RICHARDS ENSIGN SURGICAL SUPPLY CORPORATION, Appellant v. RICHARDS MANUFACTURING COMPANY, INC., William M. Rorer, Inc., and Rorer Group, Inc.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 17, 1985.
Decided Sept. 18, 1985.
Chester S. Fossee, Reale, Fossee & Ferry P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Howard D. Schwartz, Eckert, Seamans, Cherin & Mellott, Pittsburgh, for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
